name: Nightwing: The Game
description:
Batman is out of town and a riot breaks out in Gotham!

Fight your way through enemies with Nightwings aerial skills and gadgets!

You have multiple skins for Nightwing, like the classic Black and Blue suit, New52!, Rebirth and The New Teen Titans!

Can Nightwing and Robin stop the criminals? And who's the mastermind behind all this?

Find out now in this action-packed game!
